name: Summon Night 2
description: Linbaum used to be a paradise, it was saturated with a nurturing power which gives life to the world. However, it is precisely because of this energy which attracts the onslaught of invaders. To battle these foreign forces, the inhabitants of Linbaum are born with either one of these two powers, summoning, or repatriation. By utilizing their strengths, they successfully stopped the invasions.
